objects.text:
Premium canvas upper in warm sand color
Signature waffle outsole for superior grip
Padded collar for enhanced comfort
Iconic side stripe and classic branding

product_details.name: Classic Vans Authentic Canvas Sneakers - Warm Sand/White | Timeless Style & Comfort
product_details.description:
• Premium canvas upper in versatile warm sand color
• Signature Vans waffle outsole for superior grip and durability
• Clean white contrast stitching and laces
• Original low-top silhouette perfect for everyday wear
• Padded collar for enhanced comfort
• Breathable canvas material ideal for all seasons
• Vulcanized rubber midsole for flexibility
• Iconic Vans side stripe and branding
• Lightweight construction for all-day comfort
• Unisex design suitable for any style

banner_details:
This stylish sneaker banner features a modern, minimalistic layout with a warm-toned vintage aesthetic. The background uses layered soft beige tones with wavy line accents and bordered frames to create a retro yet refined canvas. The bold headline text layer (`heading`) sits prominently at the top and is followed by an emphasized yet weathered-looking subheading (`subheading`) to draw attention. A supportive tagline (`tagline`) follows, leading into a multi-line product description (`description`). A clear price tag (`price`) anchors the bottom-left, while a strong rectangular CTA button (`cta_background` and `cta`) encourages immediate action. The product image (`product_image`) is positioned right-aligned with generous space, helping maintain visual balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Beige: `#F0E6D8`
- Soft Tan: `#E8D4B2`
- Golden Brown: `#C49C6B`
- Rich Brown: `#332211`
- Coffee Brown: `#4B3A22`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of Vans sneakers in a warm mustard yellow (#E4B059), giving a youthful and vibrant vibe. The white laces (#FFFFFF) and inner lining contrast strongly with the yellow upper, making the design crisp and clean. This contrast is balanced with subtle black (#1A1A1A) detailing in the logo and the sneaker’s side trim. The sole features a mix of white (#FFFFFF) and deep gray accents (#4A4A4A) to ground the composition. For an advertisement banner, a complementary palette using mustard yellow (#E4B059), white (#FFFFFF), soft gray (#CACACA), and black (#1A1A1A) captures the product’s energetic yet minimalist appeal.
